statements: SELECT * FROM Lab_Results WHERE result_id = 1;
SELECT test_name, result_value FROM Lab_Results WHERE result_value > 50;
SELECT patient_id, test_date FROM Lab_Results ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(result_value) FROM Lab_Results WHERE test_name = 'Blood Pressure';
SELECT DISTINCT test_name FROM Lab_Results;
SELECT * FROM Lab_Results WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT result_id, patient_id, test_name FROM Lab_Results WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY result_id ASC;
SELECT test_name, AVG(result_value) AS avg_result FROM Lab_Results GROUP BY test_name HAVING avg_result > 75;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(test_date) AS latest_test_date FROM Lab_Results GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY latest_test_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT test_name FROM Lab_Results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM LabResults WHERE result_value > 100
SELECT patient_id, test_name FROM LabResults ORDER BY result_date DESC
SELECT test_id, result_value FROM LabResults WHERE patient_id = 12345
SELECT * FROM ClinicalDecisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT decision_id, patient_id, decision_description FROM ClinicalDecisions ORDER BY decision_date
SELECT * FROM LabResults WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_date DESC, result_value ASC;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result_value FROM LabResults WHERE test_id = 1 AND patient_id = 1001;
SELECT decision_id, patient_id, decision_description FROM ClinicalDecisions WHERE patient_id IN (1001, 1002) ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(result_value) as avg_result FROM LabResults WHERE result_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT L.patient_id, L.test_name, C.decision_description FROM LabResults L JOIN ClinicalDecisions C ON L.patient_id = C.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Lab_Results;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result_value FROM Lab_Results WHERE result_value > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, clinic_location FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT test_name, test_date FROM Lab_Results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Lab_Results ORDER BY test_date DESC, result_value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, result_value FROM Patients JOIN Lab_Results ON Patients.patient_id = Lab_Results.patient_id WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_value DESC;
SELECT patient_name, test_name, test_date FROM Patients JOIN Lab_Results ON Patients.patient_id = Lab_Results.patient_id WHERE test_name IN ('Blood Count', 'Lipid Profile') ORDER BY test_date ASC;

SELECT doctor_name, specialization, count(*) as total_tests FROM Lab_Results JOIN Doctors ON Lab_Results.test_name = Doctors.specialization GROUP BY doctor_name, specialization ORDER BY total_tests DESC, doctor_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, clinic_location FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Lab_Results ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT test_name, result_value, result_date FROM Lab_Results WHERE result_value > 100;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT test_name, test_description FROM Tests WHERE test_id = 5;
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM Physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT test_name, result_value, result_date FROM Lab_Results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM Physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT test_name, result_value FROM Lab_Results WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, name FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT medication, dosage, physician_id FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob > '1980-01-01';
SELECT patients.name, lab_tests.test_name FROM patients JOIN lab_tests ON patients.patient_id = lab_tests.patient_id;
SELECT prescriptions.medication, physicians.name AS doctor_name FROM prescriptions JOIN physicians ON prescriptions.physician_id = physicians.physician_id;

SELECT diagnoses.diagnosis_text, patients.name AS patient_name, physicians.specialty FROM diagnoses JOIN patients ON diagnoses.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN physicians ON diagnoses.physician_id = physicians.physician_id;
